Initialize
R1 = 1000
R2 = 1200
R7 = 0
R8 = 0
R9 = 0
R10 = 0
R11 = 50
R12 = 32

Loop until R10 = R11 {
    R3 = mem[R1]
    R4 = mem[R2]
    R5 = R3 - R4
    R6 = R5

    if(R6 != 0) {
        R14 += R2
        R8 += R3
        R9 += R4
    }
    
    R1 += 4
    R2 += 4
    R10 += 1    // Effectively, this is a for(50) loop
}


Memory[1000]: 00000002  /* R1 Starts Here */
Memory[1004]: 00000004
Memory[1008]: 00000006
Memory[1012]: 00000008
Memory[1016]: 0000000A
Memory[1020]: 0000000C
Memory[1024]: 0000000E
Memory[1028]: 00000010
Memory[1032]: 00000012
Memory[1036]: 00000014

Memory[1056]: 0000001E
